  • Classes 
    Class Description
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Event
    Uses ZEvent instead
    org.zeromq.ZTimer
    scheduled for removal in future release. Please use ZTimer instead
    org.zeromq.ZTimer.Timer
    use ZTimer.Timer instead
    zmq.MailboxSafe
    zmq.Utils

  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.zeromq.ZBeacon.Builder.blocking​(boolean)
    ignored
    org.zeromq.ZBeacon.Builder.client​(String)
    org.zeromq.ZBeacon.Builder.server​(byte[])
    org.zeromq.ZBeacon.setBeacon​(byte[])
    use the builder
    org.zeromq.ZBeacon.setListener​(ZBeacon.Listener)
    use the builder
    org.zeromq.ZBeacon.setPrefix​(byte[])
    use the builder
    org.zeromq.ZBeacon.setUncaughtExceptionHandlers​(Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler)
    use the builder
    org.zeromq.ZContext.closeSelector​(Selector)
    ZContext.createSelector() was exposed by mistake. while waiting for the API to disappear, this method is provided to allow releasing resources.
    org.zeromq.ZContext.createSelector()
    this was exposed by mistake.
    org.zeromq.ZContext.createSocket​(int)
    use ZContext.createSocket(SocketType)
    org.zeromq.ZContext.destroySocket​(ZMQ.Socket)
    Not to be used any more. ZMQ.Socket handle the close itself. It also override linger settings.
    org.zeromq.ZContext.setContext​(ZMQ.Context)
    This value should not be changed after the ZContext is initialized.
    org.zeromq.ZContext.setIoThreads​(int)
    This value should not be changed after the context is initialized.
    org.zeromq.ZContext.setMain​(boolean)
    This value should not be changed after the context is initialized.
    org.zeromq.ZContext.shadow​(ZContext)
    use the instance method directly
    org.zeromq.ZLoop.destroy()
    no-op behaviour
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Context.getBlocky()
    use ZMQ.Context.isBlocky() instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Context.socket​(int)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.device​(int, ZMQ.Socket, ZMQ.Socket)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Poller.getNext()
    use getSize instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Poller.getTimeout()
    Timeout handling has been moved to the poll() methods.
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Poller.setTimeout​(long)
    Timeout handling has been moved to the poll() methods.
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.getAsServerCurve()
    the naming is inconsistent with jzmq, please use ZMQ.Socket.getCurveServer() instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.getAsServerPlain()
    the naming is inconsistent with jzmq, please use ZMQ.Socket.getPlainServer() instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.getDelayAttachOnConnect()
    use ZMQ.Socket.setImmediate(boolean) instead (inverted logic: immediate = true <==> delay attach on connect = false)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.getHWM()
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.getIPv4Only()
    use ZMQ.Socket.isIPv6() instead (inverted logic: ipv4 = true <==> ipv6 = false)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.getReqCorrelate()
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.getReqRelaxed()
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.getSwap()
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.getTCPKeepAliveSetting()
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.hasMulticastLoop()
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.isAsServerCurve()
    the naming is inconsistent with jzmq, please use ZMQ.Socket.getCurveServer() instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.isAsServerPlain()
    the naming is inconsistent with jzmq, please use ZMQ.Socket.getPlainServer() instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setAsServerCurve​(boolean)
    the naming is inconsistent with jzmq, please use ZMQ.Socket.setCurveServer(boolean) instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setAsServerPlain​(boolean)
    the naming is inconsistent with jzmq, please use ZMQ.Socket.setPlainServer(boolean) instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setBacklog​(long)
    this option uses integer range, use ZMQ.Socket.setBacklog(int) instead.
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setDecoder​(Class<? extends IDecoder>)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setDelayAttachOnConnect​(boolean)
    use ZMQ.Socket.setImmediate(boolean) instead (warning, the boolean is inverted)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setEncoder​(Class<? extends IEncoder>)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setHWM​(long)
    this option uses integer range, use ZMQ.Socket.setHWM(int) instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setIPv4Only​(boolean)
    use ZMQ.Socket.setIPv6(boolean) instead (inverted logic: ipv4 = true <==> ipv6 = false)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setLinger​(long)
    the linger option has only integer range, use ZMQ.Socket.setLinger(int) instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setMulticastLoop​(boolean)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setRcvHWM​(long)
    this option uses integer range, use ZMQ.Socket.setRcvHWM(int) instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setReceiveBufferSize​(long)
    this option uses integer range, use ZMQ.Socket.setReceiveBufferSize(int) instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setReconnectIVL​(long)
    reconnect interval option uses integer range, use ZMQ.Socket.setReconnectIVL(int) instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setReconnectIVLMax​(long)
    this option uses integer range, use ZMQ.Socket.setReconnectIVLMax(int) instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setSendBufferSize​(long)
    this option uses integer range, use ZMQ.Socket.setSendBufferSize(int) instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setSndHWM​(long)
    this option uses integer range, use ZMQ.Socket.setSndHWM(int) instead
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setSwap​(long)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket.setTCPKeepAlive​(long)
    org.zeromq.ZPoller.createContainer​(int)
    useless
    org.zeromq.ZPoller.dispatch​(Collection<? extends ZPoller.ItemHolder>, int)
    Uses ZPoller.dispatch(Collection) instead, as size is unused
    org.zeromq.ZProxy.exit​(boolean)
    The call is synchronous: the sync parameter is ignored, as it leads to many mistakes in case of a provided ZContext.
    org.zeromq.ZProxy.newProxy​(ZContext, String, ZAgent.SelectorCreator, ZProxy.Proxy, String, Object...)
    use ZProxy.newProxy(ZContext, String, Proxy, String, Object...) instead.
    org.zeromq.ZProxy.newZProxy​(ZContext, String, ZAgent.SelectorCreator, ZProxy.Proxy, String, Object...)
    use ZProxy.newZProxy(ZContext, String, Proxy, String, Object...) instead.
    org.zeromq.ZStar.agent​(ZMQ.Socket, String)
    org.zeromq.ZStar.Fortune.create​(ZContext, ZMQ.Socket, Selector, int, ZStar.Star, Object...)
    use ZStar.Fortune.create(ZContext, Socket, int, Star, Object...) instead.
    org.zeromq.ZTimer.cancel​(ZTimer.Timer)
    use ZTimer.Timer.cancel() instead
    org.zeromq.ZTimer.reset​(ZTimer.Timer)
    use ZTimer.Timer.reset() instead
    org.zeromq.ZTimer.setInterval​(ZTimer.Timer, long)
    use ZTimer.Timer.setInterval(long) instead
    zmq.Ctx.checkTag()
    use Ctx.isActive() instead
    zmq.io.coder.DecoderBase.nextStep​(byte[], int, IDecoder.Step)
    zmq.io.Metadata.set​(String, String)
    Use Metadata.put(String, String) instead
    zmq.io.net.tcp.TcpUtils.getPeerIpAddress​(SocketChannel)
    Use Utils.getPeerIpAddress(SocketChannel) instead
    zmq.util.MultiMap.values()
    zmq.util.Timers.cancel​(Timers.Timer)
    use Timers.Timer.cancel() instead
    zmq.util.Timers.reset​(Timers.Timer)
    use Timers.Timer.reset() instead
    zmq.util.Timers.setInterval​(Timers.Timer, long)
    use Timers.Timer.setInterval(long) instead
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    org.zeromq.ZActor​(ZAgent.SelectorCreator, ZActor.Actor, String, Object...)
    use ZActor(Actor, String, Object...)
    org.zeromq.ZBeacon​(String, byte[], int, byte[], long, boolean, boolean)
    org.zeromq.ZMQ.Socket​(ZMQ.Context, int)
    use Socket(Context, SocketType)
    org.zeromq.ZProxy​(ZAgent.SelectorCreator, ZProxy.Proxy, String, Object...)
    use ZProxy(Proxy, String, Object...) instead.
    org.zeromq.ZStar​(ZAgent.SelectorCreator, ZStar.Fortune, String, Object...)
    use ZStar(Fortune, String, Object...) instead.
    zmq.io.net.Address​(String, String)
